Notes: An area that displays a layout showing how to perform Spin Attacks with the Wiimote.

Obj_arg0.Name: Power-Up Condition
Obj_arg0.Description: The required power-up state condition to enable the tutorial.

SW_APPEAR.Description: The object will appear when this switch is activated.

SW_A.Description: If used, the tutorial will be shown only if this switch is deactivated. Can be used in combination with SW_B.

SW_B.Description: If this and SW_A are used, the tutorial will be shown only if SW_A and SW_B are deactivated. Has no use if SW_A is not used.

SW_AWAKE.Description: The object will become visible and resume movement when this switch is activated.
